text: Mwesi wakuchimbichika kwa mwesi wakuchimbichika, soni ichindu yakuchimbichika (naga utyosyedwe uchimbichimbi wakweo) iŵichilidwe mbusyo, sano jwantendele uwwanga nombe jenumanja mum'buchisyani uwwangao mwakulandana ni mwantendele ŵanganyammwe uwwanga, soni mun'jogopani Allah, ni manyililani yanti Allah ali pamo ni ŵaoga (wakun'jogopa Jwalakwe)
